music-moods.gui.configuration.error:
Unable to save your settings.

Be sure file permissions are correctly set.
music-moods.option.separator.situational: Includes the title screen, various biomes, being underwater and battles.
music-moods.option.allowReplacingCurrent: Allows replacing the current music with a more fitting track.
music-moods.option.alwaysPlayMusic.descr:
Whether to keep music playing at all times or not.

Good if you dislike silence.
music-moods.option.immediatelyPlayOnRepl: Plays the new situational music immediately, fading in from the old one.
music-moods.option.fadeInTicks.descripti:
How long it takes for the new track to fade in, counted in ticks.

Only applies when the old track was replaced by a new track.
music-moods.option.fadeOutTicks.descript:
How long it takes for the old track to fade out, counted in ticks.

Only applies when the old track was replaced by a new track.
